page.title: 14Farming In Wash Common
page.content: We went to Wash Common Farm to ask the farmer some questions about the farm.We found out that the farmer used several different types of machinery:-tractors,ploughs,combine harvesters,drills,rollers,bailer and a forage harvester.The farmer said he liked working on his farm.His family had been farming there for eighty years.He told us that he kept cows , two dogs and cats. We found out that he specialised in dairy cows which he milks twice a day. He owns 500 acres of land and 200 acres of it he uses for growing crops. He grows barley, oats, wheat and kale. He employs two full time workers, one part time worker and his mother helps with all the paper work. After he answered our questions he showed us round the farm.
